Thanks for the heads up on the different domains - I hadn't quite thought about that! I have added a note around that on the package I have created.
I created [this package](https://github.com/liamgold/xperience-community-page-edit-button) which adds an "Edit Page" button to the front-end website channel that allows logged in content editors quick and easy access to the page in the channel's content tree. The button appears at the bottom right.
